#include <stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int size,prev_count=0,curr_count;
    scanf("%d",&size);
    long long int arr[size+1],max=-1;
    for(int i=0; i<size; ++i)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&arr[i]);
        if(arr[i]>max)
            max=arr[i];
    }
    for(int i=0; i<size;)
    {
        curr_count=0;
        if(arr[i]==max)
        {
            while(arr[i]==max)
            {
                curr_count++;
                i++;
            }
            
            if(curr_count>prev_count)
                prev_count=curr_count;
        }
        
        else
            i++;
        
    }
    printf("%d\n",prev_count);
    return 0;
}
